componentDescription: An interactive component allowing users to select and preview files, with options for validation and progress display.

accept.description: Defines the file types accepted by the uploader (e.g., 'image/*', '.pdf').

maxSize.description: Specifies the maximum allowed size for uploaded files in bytes.

onFileSelect.description: Callback function invoked when a single file is successfully selected.

onMultipleFileSelect.description: Callback function invoked when multiple files are successfully selected.

validateFile.description: A function to provide custom validation logic for a selected file, returning an error message or null.

onError.description: Callback function triggered when an error occurs during file selection or validation.

thumbnail.description: URL for a default thumbnail image to display.

multiple.description: Indicates whether the uploader allows selecting multiple files.

containerProps.description: Props to be passed to the main container View component of the Uploader.

errorMessageProps.description: Props to be passed to the Text component displaying error messages.

thumbnailContainerProps.description: Props to be passed to the container View component specifically for the thumbnail.

loadingProps.description: Props to be passed to the View component representing a loading state.

progressProps.description: Props to be passed to the View component displaying upload progress.

videoProps.description: Props to be passed to the View component used for video previews.

imageProps.description: Props to be passed to the Image component used for image previews.

iconProps.description: Props to be passed to the Icon component displayed within the uploader.

textProps.description: Props to be passed to the Text component displayed within the uploader.

renderVideo.description: A render prop function to provide a custom video display component.
renderVideo.defaultValue: Renders a <View as="video"> element showing a preview of the selected video file.

renderText.description: A render prop function to provide a custom text display component.
renderText.defaultValue: Renders a <Text> component with optional top margin.

renderImage.description: A render prop function to provide a custom image display component.
renderImage.defaultValue: Renders an <Image> component showing a preview of the selected image.

renderError.description: A render prop function to provide a custom error message display component.
renderError.defaultValue: Renders a <Text> component displaying the errorMessage in red, font size 12, with top margin.

renderFile.description: A render prop function to provide a custom file display component.
renderFile.defaultValue: Renders the selected file's name and size in KB using <Text> components, centered vertically.

renderProgress.description: A render prop function to provide a custom progress display component.
renderProgress.defaultValue: Renders a horizontal progress bar with percentage text.

previewUrl.description: The URL for the file preview, typically an image or video source.

thumbnailUrl.description: The URL for the thumbnail image, used for visual representation of the file.

errorMessage.description: The error message to be displayed to the user.

isLoading.description: Boolean indicating if the uploader is currently in a loading state.

icon.description: A React node to be rendered as an icon within the uploader.

text.description: The primary text content displayed within the uploader component.

progress.description: The current progress percentage of an ongoing upload.

fileType.description: The detected or specified type of the file being handled ('video', 'image', or 'file').

handleClick.description: Function to handle click events on the uploader component.

views.type: { container?: ViewProps; view?: ViewProps; image?: ImageProps; horizontal?: ViewProps; text?: ViewProps; }
views.description: An object containing specific prop sets for different internal view components.

views.container.description: Props for the main container View within the 'views' object.

views.view.description: General ViewProps for a generic view within the 'views' object.

views.image.description: ImageProps for an Image component within the 'views' object.

views.horizontal.description: Props for a horizontal layout View component within the 'views' object.

views.text.description: Props for a text-related View component within the 'views' object.
